code: import React from'react';import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{AddToCart}from'../../actions/CartAction';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{formatPrice}from'../../untils/index';import{message}from'antd';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Product(props){const{product}=props;const dispatch=useDispatch();const success=()=>{message.success({content:'Thêm vào giỏ hàng thành công',duration:1,className:'custom-class',style:{position:'absolute',right:'2rem',top:'2rem',margin:'1rem 0'}});};const AddProductToCart=async product=>{const action=AddToCart(product);await dispatch(action);success();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"hotsale-listproduct-product",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/detail/"+product._id,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:product.image}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"hotsale-listproduct-product-name",children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"price",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"price1",children:[formatPrice(product.salePrice),"\u0111"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"price2",children:[formatPrice(product.price),"\u0111"]})]})]}),product.percentDiscount>=5?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"discount",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[product.percentDiscount,"%"]})}):'',/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"buy",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"",onClick:e=>{AddProductToCart(product);},children:" Mua Ngay"})})]});}export default Product;
